Load libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
```
Read in data
```{r}
SGMA_2040 <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "SGMA_Model.csv"))
Open_Access <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "OpenAccess.csv"))
SGMA_2060 <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "SGMA_2060.csv"))
SGMA_2080 <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "SGMA2080.csv"))
SGMA_2100 <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "SGMA2100.csv"))
Artifical_Recharge <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "Artificial_Recharge.csv"))
Recharge_Linear_Decline <- read_csv(file.path("Data", "Recharge_Linear_Decline.csv"))
```

Merging SGMA and Open Access Data Frames 
```{r}

SGMA_Model <- SGMA_2040 %>% 
  rename(SGMA_2040 = Withdrawals) 
  
Open_Access <- Open_Access %>% 
  rename(Open_Withdrawl = Withdrawals) 

merged_withdrawls <- left_join(SGMA_Model, Open_Access, by =c('t')) %>% 
  gather(key = 'Withdrawl_Type', value = 'Withdrawl', Open_Withdrawl, SGMA_Withdrawl)

```


SGMA vs Open Access
```{r}
colors <- c('cyan4', 'indianred3')

direct_labels <-  merged_withdrawls %>% 
  group_by(Withdrawl_Type) %>%
  summarize(y = min(Withdrawl))


line_plot <- merged_withdrawls %>%
  ggplot(aes(t, Withdrawl )) +
  geom_line( aes(group = Withdrawl_Type, color = Withdrawl_Type), size = 1) +
  scale_color_manual(values=colors) +
  theme_minimal_hgrid() +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Withdrawls in Acre Feet") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") 

direct_labels_axis <- axis_canvas(line_plot, axis = "y") +
  geom_text(
 data = direct_labels,
 aes(y = y, label = c("Open Access", "SGMA")),
 x = .05,
 size = 4.5,
 hjust = 0
  )

p_direct_labels <-  insert_yaxis_grob(line_plot, direct_labels_axis)

ggdraw(p_direct_labels)
```

2040 vs 2060 vs 2080 vs 2100
```{r}
require(plyr)

SGMA_2040 <- SGMA_Model %>% 
  rename(SGMA_2040 = SGMA_Withdrawl) 

SGMA_2060  <- SGMA_2060  %>% 
  rename(SGMA_2060 = Withdrawals) 
  
SGMA_2080  <- SGMA_2080 %>% 
  rename(SGMA_2080 = Withdrawals) 

SGMA_2100  <- SGMA_2100 %>% 
  rename(SGMA_2100 = Withdrawals) 

merged_withdrawls <- join_all(list(SGMA_Model, SGMA_2060, SGMA_2080, SGMA_2100), by ='t', type = 'full') %>% 
  gather(key = 'Withdrawl_Type', value = 'Withdrawl', SGMA_2060, SGMA_2080, SGMA_2100)

line_plot <- SGMA_2060 %>%
  ggplot(aes(t, SGMA_2060)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  scale_color_manual(values=colors) +
  theme_minimal_hgrid() +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Withdrawls in Acre Feet") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") 

```
